cont.entity_a: Inexpensive alternative to recommended handles by using a water pipe. Pre-bent pieces and fittings are very expensive, making this a cost-effective choice for projects. Value and price are unbeatable compared to alternatives.
cont.entity_b: High cost but justifiable due to its capabilities.

cont.entity_a: Built-in levels are handy, quick, and easy to use. Arrows on Gardner Bender tools are easy to read. Used both sizes for a large project, making it easy and quick.
cont.entity_b: Easy to use and effective for cutting and bending rebar. Quick and precise in making preset or custom bends. Well-engineered and portable, making it easy to carry.

cont.entity_a: Very strong with a level that ensures accurate angles.
cont.entity_b: Durable, strong, and reliable for consistent performance.

cont.entity_a: Allows for careful bending of heavier tubing, but requires a long and strong stick for leverage. Makes perfect 90-degree bends. Design includes two levels for 45 and 90-degree bends. Works well for 3/4" EMT but not as effective for 1/2" EMT. Description inaccurately states it bends multiple sizes; only bends 3/4 EMT and 1/2 rigid tube.
cont.entity_b: Cuts and bends rebar quickly, enhancing efficiency and productivity. Performs well with #5 grade 60 rebar. Perfect for shaping and cutting 1/2 inch rebar with ease. Portable and versatile, able to cut up to #5 rebar.
Durable for all rebar bending and cutting uses.

cont.entity_a: Does not include the handle or a bending manual.
